Module org.microbean.loader.typesafe.config
Package org.microbean.loader.typesafe.config

Class TypesafeConfigHoconProvider

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.loader.spi.AbstractProvider
org.microbean.loader.typesafe.config.TypesafeConfigHoconProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Provider
public class TypesafeConfigHoconProvider extends AbstractProvider
An AbstractProvider that uses a Config to produce Values.
Author:
Laird Nelson

  • Constructor Details

    • TypesafeConfigHoconProvider

      public TypesafeConfigHoconProvider()
      Creates a new TypesafeConfigHoconProvider that reads solely from a classpath resource named application.conf, using the context classloader.

      No stacking of other configurations is performed.

      See Also:
      • TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(ClassLoader, String)

    • TypesafeConfigHoconProvider

      public TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(String resourceName)
      Creates a new TypesafeConfigHoconProvider that reads solely from a classpath resource bearing the supplied name using the context classloader.

      No stacking of other configurations is performed.

      Parameters:
      resourceName - the name of the classpath resource; must not be null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if resourceName is null
      See Also:
      • TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(ClassLoader, String)

    • TypesafeConfigHoconProvider

      public TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(ClassLoader cl, String resourceName)
      Creates a new TypesafeConfigHoconProvider that reads solely from a classpath resource bearing the supplied name using the supplied ClassLoader.

      No stacking of other configurations is performed.

      Parameters:
      cl - the ClassLoader; may be null in which case the system classloader will be used instead, normally via ClassLoader.getSystemResourceAsStream(String)
      resourceName - the name of the classpath resource; must not be null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if resourceName is null

    • TypesafeConfigHoconProvider

      public TypesafeConfigHoconProvider(Type lowerBound, ClassLoader cl, String resourceName)
      Creates a new TypesafeConfigHoconProvider that reads solely from a classpath resource bearing the supplied name using the supplied ClassLoader.

      No stacking of other configurations is performed.

      Parameters:
      lowerBound - the lower type bound of this TypesafeConfigHoconProvider implementation; may be null
      cl - the ClassLoader; may be null in which case the system classloader will be used instead, normally via ClassLoader.getSystemResourceAsStream(String)
      resourceName - the name of the classpath resource; must not be null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if resourceName is null

  • Method Details

    • get

      public final Value<?> get(Loader<?> requestor, Path<? extends Type> absolutePath)
      Description copied from interface: Provider
      Returns a Value suitable for the supplied Loader and Path, or null if there is no such Value now and if there never will be such a Value for the supplied arguments.

      In addition to the other requirements described here, the following assertions will be (and must be) true when this method is called in the normal course of events:

      • assert absolutePath.isAbsolute();
      • assert absolutePath.startsWith(requestor.absolutePath());
      • assert !absolutePath.equals(requestor.absolutePath());

      If any caller does not honor these requirements, undefined behavior may result.

      Parameters:
      requestor - the Loader seeking a Value; must not be null
      absolutePath - an absolute Path for which the supplied Loader is seeking a value; must not be null
      Returns:
      a Value more or less suitable for the combination of the supplied Loader and Path, or null if there is no such Value now and if there never will be such a Value for the supplied arguments
